Description: Unique 10-digit identifier for each restaurant establishment. All inspections/violations for the same restaurant share this ID.
"Doing Business As" represents the name of the restaurant.
Borough of the restaurant.
Value: 1 = MANHATTAN, 2 = BRONX, 3 = BROOKLYN, 4 = QUEENS, 5 = STATEN ISLAND, Missing

Description: Building number of the address.
Street name of the address.
Zip code of the establishment’s address.
Phone number for the establishment.
Description of the restaurant's cuisine.
Date when the inspection was conducted.
Value: Note: 01/01/1900 mean an establishment has not yet had an inspection.

Description: The actions that is associated with each restaurant inspection.
Value:
• No violations were recorded at the time of this inspection. 
• Establishment re-opened by DOHMH 
• Establishment re-closed by DOHMH 
• Establishment Closed by DOHMH. Violations were cited in the following area(s) and those requiring immediate action were addressed. 
• "Missing" = not yet inspected;

Description: Violation code associated with a restaurant inspection.
Violation description associated with a restaurant inspection.
Indicator of critical violation (critical violations are those most likely to contribute to food-borne illness).
Total score for a particular inspection. Lower scores means less violations.
Letter grade assigned based on score.
Value:
• A = Grade A
• B = Grade B
• C = Grade C
• Z = Grade Pending
• P= Grade Pending
• N = Not Yet Graded

Description: Date when the current grade was issued to the restaurant.
Date when the extract was run to produce this dataset.
A combination of the inspection program and the type of inspection performed.
Value:
•Calorie Posting/ Compliance Inspection
•Calorie Posting/Initial Inspection
•Calorie Posting/ Re-Inspection
•Calorie Posting/ Second Compliance Inspection
•Cycle Inspection/Compliance Inspection
•Cycle Inspection/Initial Inspection
•Cycle Inspection/Re-Inspection
•Cycle Inspection/Reopening Inspection
•Cycle Inspection/Second Compliance Inspection
•Inter-Agency Task Force/Initial Inspection
•Inter-Agency Task Force/Re-Inspection
•Pre-Permit (Non-operational)/ Compliance Inspection
•Pre-Permit (Non-operational)/ Initial Inspection
•Pre-Permit (Non-operational)/ Re-Inspection
•Pre-Permit (Non-operational)/ Second Compliance Inspection
•Pre-Permit(Operational)/Compliance Inspection
•Pre-Permit(Operational)/Initial Inspection
•Pre-Permit(Operational)/Re-Inspection
•Pre-Permit(Operational)/Reopening Inspection
•Pre-Permit(Operational)/Second Compliance Inspection
•Smoke-Free Air Act/Complaint (Initial Inspection)
•Smoke-Free Air Act/Compliance Inspection
•Smoke-Free Air Act/Initial Inspection
•Smoke-Free Air Act/Limited Inspection
•Smoke-Free Air Act/Re-inspection
•Smoke-Free Air Act/Second Compliance Inspection
•Trans Fat/Compliance Inspection
•Trans Fat/Initial Inspection
•Trans Fat/Re-inspection
•Trans Fat/Second Compliance Inspection

Description: Latitude coordinate of the restaurant.
Longitude coordinate of the restaurant.
Community Board number (used for NYC political / planning subdivision) for the location.
City Council district number associated with the address.
Census tract ID for the address.
Building Identification Number is an unique building-level identifier used in NYC property records.
Borough-Block-Lot number is an unique property identifier in NYC land records.
Neighborhood Tabulation Area represents medium-sized statistical geographies for reporting Decennial Census and American Community Survey.
Geospatial point representing the establishment’s approximate location.
